sections.title: About Self-Care (PLEASE)
sections.content: PLEASE helps you check basic physical needs that affect your emotional balance. It stands for: Physical illness, Eating well, Avoiding mood-altering substances, Sleep, and Exercise. When these areas are neglected, emotions feel harder to manage and decisions become tougher. Taking care of these basics builds a steadier foundation for handling stress and regulating emotions.

sections.title: Example
sections.content: Sam had been anxious and irritable for days. Using PLEASE, Sam realized several basic needs were offâ€”a headache, skipped meals, too much caffeine, poor sleep, and no exercise. After taking care of these areas, Sam felt much calmer and more balanced.

sections.title: Be Patient With Yourself
sections.content: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion
